institution: TAMK Tampere University of Applied Sciences
description: I completed an exchange semester at TAMK in Tampere, Finland, during my bachelor's degree, where I connected with international students, conducted interesting projects, and broadened my horizons by experiencing diverse cultures.

institution: ZHAW Zurich University of Applied Sciences
description: Pursued a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at ZHAW in Winterthur, gaining a strong foundation in software development, algorithms, and data management, while developing problem-solving, analytical, and teamwork skills through practical projects and coursework.

During my apprenticeship in Computer Science, I completed the mandatory vocational school and voluntarily pursued the additional Professional Maturity (BMS), gaining hands-on experience in software development, IT systems, and professional skills while strengthening teamwork and project management.
